com.martinambrus.adminAnything.instrumentation

Class Instrumentator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martinambrus.adminAnything.instrumentation.Instrumentator

  • public class Instrumentator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for instrumenting the whole transformation, including attaching agent to the JVM, copying relevant library files where they are supposed to be and downloading Javassist library if not found.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Instrumentator(java.lang.String attachLibFolder)
      Constructor, stores library folder to which to save and from which to load all the static libraries required for the various class transformations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getJavassistLibPath()
      Getter method for Javassist library path.
      void instrumentate()
      Starts the complicated instrumentation process.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Instrumentator

        public Instrumentator(java.lang.String attachLibFolder)
        Constructor, stores library folder to which to save and from which to load all the static libraries required for the various class transformations.
        Parameters:
        attachLibFolder - Library folder to which to save and from which to load all the static libraries required for the various class transformations.

    • Method Detail

      • getJavassistLibPath

        public static java.lang.String getJavassistLibPath()
        Getter method for Javassist library path.
        Returns:
        Returns the location where the Javassist library should reside.

      • instrumentate

        public void instrumentate()
                   throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                          java.lang.SecurityException,
                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                          java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          AttachNotSupportedException,
                          AgentLoadException,
                          AgentInitializationException,
                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Starts the complicated instrumentation process.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - If we could not transform a class because of a missing defined field.
        java.lang.SecurityException - If we could not transform a class because JVM security did not allow us to.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If we could not transform a class because of our stupidity.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If we could not transform a class because we were prohibited from accessing a class.
        java.io.IOException - If we could not transform a class because there was a input / output error trying to read/write something.
        AttachNotSupportedException - If we could not transform a class because attaching an agent to the JVM is not supported.
        AgentLoadException - If we could not transform a class because the agent failed to load.
        AgentInitializationException - If we could not transform a class because the agent failed to initialize.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If we could not transform a class because we couldn't find a class that should be transformed.
